Bibliography.titolo1: Effects of earthquake of 23th November 1980 on pre-existing landslides in the Senerchia area (Southern Italy), in "Proceedings of of the International Symposium on engineeering and geology problems in seismic areas", Bari 13-19 April 1986, vol.4, pp.177-198.
